Name: Tiny Civilization
About the game: Love history, but tired of heavy history simulation games? Try this 'tiny civilization'! Collect resources in match-3 play Drag three block together to collect resources. Food to feed your people. Industry to support all kinds of skills. Culture to unlock technology. Based on this, a variety of mechanics and experiences are derived, easy to learn, make you enjoy the historical adventure. Overcoming the difficulties in the development of civilization As time goes by, the growth of population will increase the consumption of food, and the communication between continents will bring many conflicts. The spread of wars will make the world bare thousands of miles, but I believe that you can make good use of resources and your wisdom to solve the crisis. The hymn of man is the hymn of courage! If I grow fast enough, the war won't catch me! Help from historical heroes The Hero mode tests the player's finesse in base of the normal mode.Fortunatly,many historical heroes will help you to overcome it. Choice careful and make plan wisly! Simulate the scene of history It's a mini casual game, but it's filled with love for history. Interesting illustrations and murals, dynamic music, may immersed you player in the changes of history. The fate of human civilization is in your hands.
